dcterms:creator: Samuel R Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D Manning
dcterms:description: A dataset that consists of a collection of 570k human-written English sentence pairs manually labeled for balanced classification with the labels entailment, contradiction, and neutral.
dcterms:title: Stanford Natural Language Inference (SNLI)

dcterms:creator: Nikita Nangia
Adina Williams
Angeliki Lazaridou
Samuel R Bowman
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of 433k sentence pairs annotated with textual entailment information and is seen as a successor to the SNLI dataset, featuring sentence pairs from written text, spoken text, and a wide range of other genres.
dcterms:title: Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference (MNLI)
